content: ヒモの部分から編み始め ガーター編みを編みながら引き返し編みで形を作っていく．段消しをせず進めていくので引き返し編み初心者の方にも簡単に編むことができます sport weightの場合は１本で light fingeringの場合は２本取りで編む事ができます 糸 サンプル1 light fingering yarn 2本取り 約246yards 225m knitting for olive cotton merino 70% organic cotton 30% rws wool 273 yards / 250 m 100g サンプル色はdark sea green 1玉 サンプル2 sport weight yarn １本取り 約160 yards 146 m quince & co willet 100% cotton 160yards / 146 m 50g サンプル色はstarboard 1カセ 針 1 × us 4 3 5 mm の32 / 80 cm またはそれ以上 の輪針 またはゲージが取れる太さの針 ゲージ ブロッキング後 us 4 3 5mm の針を使用し ガーター編みで19目 & 52段 = 4 / 10 cm サイズ 出来上がり寸法 84 cm×10 5 cm this scarf is knit top down cast on stitches for main body and the cords after binding off stitches for the cords start working short row for the main body finish with picot bobble use two starnds of light fingering weight yarn or single strand of sport weight yarn yarn sample 1 light fingering yarn held double approximately 246yards / 225m knitting for olive cotton merino 70% organic cotton 30% rws wool 273 yards / 250 m 100g sample is shown in dark sea green 1ball sample 2 sport weight yarn approximately 160 yards / 146 m quince & co willet 100% cotton 160yards / 146 m 50g sample is shown in starboard 1skein needles us 4 3 5 mm 32 / 80 cm or longer circular needle or needle required to obtain gauge gauge after blocking 19 stitches & 52 row = 4 / 10 cm in garter st with us 4 3 5mm needle size finished measurements length 33 / 84 cm width 4¼ / 10 5 cm
